#summary List of ndjin webservices

= Introduction =

Ndjin webservice can be called using HTTP/JSON or XML request (see [WebServiceProtocol]).

Request URL should be formatted as: `http://[you application site name].ndjin.net/ng/service/[service name]/[operation name]`

For example: `http://myapp.ndjin.net/ng/service/AuthenticationService/getSessionInfo`


= AuthenticationService =

@NGWebService(securityLevel=NGSecurityLevel.Open)
    public Instance getSessionInfo()

@NGWebService(securityLevel=NGSecurityLevel.Authenticaded)
    public Instance getUser()


@NGWebService(securityLevel=NGSecurityLevel.Open)
    public void logout() 

@NGWebService(securityLevel=NGSecurityLevel.Open)
    public Instance validateCaptcha( Instance parametersInstance ) throws Exception

@NGWebService(securityLevel=NGSecurityLevel.AdministratorLevel)
